articles.title: Michael Jordan's sport shoes sell for record $2.2m - BBC News - BBC News
articles.description: A pair of trainers once worn by basketball legend Michael Jordan has sold for $2.2m (£1.7m) at auction, becoming the priciest shoes ever sold.The signed snea...

articles.author: Jack Otway
articles.title: Sir Alex Ferguson got tough with Man Utd board as Sevilla revenge mission awaits - Express
articles.description: Manchester United icon Sir Alex Ferguson is likely to be in attendance for his side's Europa League showdown with Sevilla on Thursday night.
articles.content:
Mourinho was axed in December, with the Portuguese paying the price for a terrible 3-1 defeat to Liverpool at Anfield.
